items.sentence: Tom spends hours in his room drawing pictures.
Tom bought a Christmas tree for Mary's family.
Tom reminded me that he had a meeting at 2:30.
If my kids were younger, I'd buy one for them.
The person they were talking about wasn't Tom.
That isn't a snake. It's just a piece of rope.
Many people go to the beach during the summer.
Tom was in the military, but now he's retired.
Not everybody who drinks becomes an alcoholic.
Tom is serving drinks to the guests right now.
